Corporate+Legal and Compliance+Contract.EXPLANATION: The percentage of contracts that are renewed when they expire.
Corporate+Legal and Compliance+Contract.FORMULA: (Number of Renewed Contracts / Total Contracts up for Renewal) * 100

Corporate+Legal and Compliance+Contract.EXPLANATION: Measures the difference between the actual contract value and the negotiated value.
Corporate+Legal and Compliance+Contract.FORMULA: (Actual Contract Value - Negotiated Contract Value) / Negotiated Contract Value * 100

Corporate+Legal and Compliance+Contract.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of contracts that meet all specified terms and conditions.
The average time taken to complete contract negotiations.
Corporate+Legal and Compliance+Contract.FORMULA: Total Time Spent on Contract Negotiations / Number of Contracts Negotiated

Corporate+Legal and Compliance+Contract.EXPLANATION: The total time from the start of a contract to its expiration or renewal.
Corporate+Legal and Compliance+Contract.FORMULA: Average Duration from Contract Initiation to Expiration

Corporate+Legal and Compliance+Contract.KPIS: Percentage of contracts with favorable terms
Corporate+Legal and Compliance+Contract.EXPLANATION: Measures the proportion of contracts with terms more beneficial than average.
Corporate+Legal and Compliance+Contract.FORMULA: (Number of Contracts with Favorable Terms / Total Contracts) * 100

Corporate+Legal and Compliance+Contract.EXPLANATION: Measures how satisfied customers are with the terms of their contracts.
Corporate+Legal and Compliance+Contract.FORMULA: Average Customer Satisfaction Rating on Contract Terms

Corporate+Legal and Compliance+Contract.EXPLANATION: The percentage of profit made from contracts.
